data.title: ROBERT BENDER OBITUARY
data.meta_description: Robert Martin Bender Resident of San Ramon Robert born on April 30, 1944, died in his garden on September 12, 2012 doing what he loved. A Bay Area native, b
data.text: Robert Martin Bender Resident of San Ramon Robert born on April 30, 1944, died in his garden on September 12, 2012 doing what he loved. A Bay Area native, born in Oakland, raised in Hayward and spent the last 26 years of his life in San Ramon. He is survived by his large family including his wife Madeline (Maggi) for 39 years, his 3 sons Cameron, Austin, Eric (& Crystal), daughter-in-law Mandy, 2 grand daughters Darla and Simone and his 2 dogs Elli and Emma. Other family includes his twin brother John, elder brother Charles and nephews John and Damon. He worked as a Mechanical Draftsman at Mack Truck for 7 years and as a Project Engineer at Electrofusion BrushWellman for over 20. He retired 3 years ago and enjoyed this time with his wife, his family and at home; dedicating his days to his great garden and his dogs. Donations in Mr. Bender’s memory can be made to Animal Services Department. Send checks to: 4800 Imhoff Pl., Martinez, CA 94553. Please add note specifying “In Memory of Robert Bender.” Services will be held on Saturday September 22, 2012 from 12 noon to 3 PM, at Moreau Catholic Hight School’s Student Center: 27170 Mission St. in Hayward.
